name: Cyprus

typical_paths.label: Cyprus AIF ecosystem (informational)
bullets: High-level orientation around AIF / AIFLNP / RAIF concepts (verify current definitions with CySEC).
Manager model (AIFM / sub-threshold manager) depends on size/activities and must be verified.

marketing_notes: Marketing and offering rules depend on investor type (professional/retail) and fund/manager status.
Always confirm licensing/registration thresholds and any local notifications.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any public offering/retail distribution in Cyprus.
Any reliance on AIFLNP/RAIF structuring details without current counsel confirmation.
